Text.Page:
Tyrant's Overwatch is guarded by the {@LinkCreature:32#10#Sihran witches} and {@LinkCreature:32#11#polykinds}, and we can't get past them.

Mind taking care of a few? Relinda would see to it you're rewarded for your work.
Thank you for your hard work. Please take this reward.
I need to know you've taken care of the witches first.
